description:
Going ultralight shouldn’t mean cutting a good night’s sleep. Equipped with Big Agnes’ expandable side panels, the Torchlight UL lets you customize your sleeping bag to your sleeping style, all while keeping weight low. With its customizable sleeping profile, this bag fits a variety of sleeping styles and body types. 2-way zippers allow you to add room exactly where you need it, foot, hips or shoulders, you can even open both sides all the way, gaining an extra 26cm of sleep space, like going from a double bed to a Queen.

  • Shell is ultralight polyester with a water-repellent finish. Lining is soft polyester taffeta that wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Zippered expandable side panels run from shoulder to footbox and allow up to 13cm of expansion per side
  • 850 fill DownTek™ uses a Bluesign™ approved chemistry to treat for water-repellency, and also has antimicrobial and antibacterial protection
  • Body-mapped baffle construction provides efficient heat distribution and an incredible warmth-to-weight ratio
  • Draft flap behind the zipper, yoke and draft wedge at the connection between the pad and the bag ensure cold air doesn't sneak in
  • Vaulted footbox allows plenty of room for happy feet
  • Hood lets you lift and move your head, even when fully zipped up and has a one-handed cinch adjustment
  • Interior loops for attaching a bag liner
  • Hang loops let you air it out in the sun
name: Big Agnes Torchlight UL -7C Sleeping Bag - Men's
